content.raw: Oh, actually I'm mistaken, it said `qstring_to_unicode(value_item.text())` in one parent, and was simply absent from the other. But while I was doing the merge I was removing the `qstring_to_unicode` calls because the other parent had switched to API v2 of everything in PyQt4, making those calls not just unnecessary but exception-raising.
content.html: Oh, actually I'm mistaken, it said qstring_to_unicode(value_item.text()) in one parent, and was simply absent from the other. But while I was doing the merge I was removing the qstring_to_unicode calls because the other parent had switched to API v2 of everything in PyQt4, making those calls not just unnecessary but exception-raising.
